data.title: Formnext – Hub for Additive Manufacturing
data.meta_description: As the hub for Additive Manufacturing, Formnext is the international meeting point for industrial 3D Printing experts and production professionals from a wide range of application industries. With the trade show in Frankfurt and providing content throughout the year, we bundle expertise and create a unique experience focused on in-depth professional exchange and access to the latest AM solutions. This combination enables our community to actively shape the next generation of intelligent industrial production.
data.text:
As the hub for Additive Manufacturing, Formnext is the international meeting point for industrial 3D Printing experts and production professionals from a wide range of application industries. With the trade show in Frankfurt and providing content throughout the year, we bundle expertise and create a unique experience focused on in-depth professional exchange and access to the latest AM solutions. This combination enables our community to actively shape the next generation of intelligent industrial production.

Formnext – more than a trade show

Our AM services and offerings keep you up to date and provide you with access to the AM community and the latest developments along the entire AM process chain 365 days a year. In addition to our event portfolio in the Expo & Convention section, current Industry Insights and Industry Events all year round, our AM Directory gives you an overview of providers that offer the AM solution you are looking for. And don't forget the AM Jobs portal which makes it easy to peruse job postings from our exhibitors. Get started on your future in Additive Manufacturing or see where your expertise is needed most to advance modern production.

Discover the fascinating world of Additive Manufacturing at Formnext's hub for Additive Manufacturing!

Formnext Frankfurt, 19 – 22 November 2024

Where ideas take shape.

The annual industry highlight for Additive Manufacturing will take place in Frankfurt am Main on 19 – 22 November 2024. The Frankfurt exhibition grounds will be a vibrant place for face-to-face encounters and an international showcase for the latest solutions along the entire process chain in industrial 3D Printing. The event’s international exhibitors come from over 35 countries and account for an impressive 64 percent of all those attending. At Formnext almost every nation and application industry in the AM community takes the opportunity to experience Additive Manufacturing live and in person. The supporting program also offers a wide range of additional inspiration regarding the latest developments and future prospects, not to mention plenty of ways to make new contacts.

Formnext Frankfurt - setting the course for a more productive, sustainable industrial future with pioneering AM technologies!

Formnext is more than just 4 days a year!

Whether it’s exclusively researched application stories, insights from behind closed doors, technology updates, panels with industry insiders, or a structured overview of the complex, multilayered world of generative manufacturing – we keep our eyes and ears open to provide you with fresh insights into the AM industry through your medium of choice. Formnext Magazine, Formnext.TV, the AM Field Guide and our Newsroom – all look behind the scenes of AM production and bring you the latest on Additive Manufacturing all year round.
